section name: Using secondary sources to support your argument (out of 60 points)
tier 1 description: Argument is supported with numerous exceptionally specific, clear, & relevant examples from secondary sources.
tier 2 description: Argument is supported with a couple specific, clear, & relevant examples from secondary sources
tier 3 description: Argument is supported with one or two specific examples from secondary sources or the examples are weak or unclear.
tier 4 description: Vague, unclear, and/or irrelevant support from secondary source
tier 5 description: No support from secondary sources or support is uncited

section name: Using supporting evidence from class materials (including your chosen primary source) (out of 60 points)
tier 1 description: Many specific, clear, & relevant examples from class materials are provided as supporting evidence.
tier 2 description: A couple examples from class materials are provided as supporting evidence & most of the evidence is specific, clear, & relevant.
tier 3 description: One or two examples from class materials are provided as supporting evidence & some of the evidence provided is specific, clear, & relevant.
tier 4 description: One (1) example from class materials is provided as supporting evidence and/or the evidence provided is vague, unclear, and/or irrelevant.
tier 5 description: No examples are provided from class materials as supporting evidence or support is uncited.

section name: Reflecting on Historical Context (drawing connections to other historical moments in the course) (out of 60 points)
tier 1 description: The essay includes many exceptionally specific, clear, & relevant reflections on the historical context of this course.
tier 2 description: The essay includes some specific, clear, & relevant reflections on the historical context of this course.
tier 3 description: The essay includes one or two somewhat specific, clear, & relevant reflections on the historical context of this course.
tier 4 description: The essay includes vague, unclear, and/or irrelevant reflections on the historical context of this course.
tier 5 description: The essay does not reflect on the historical context of this course

tier 1 description: Presentation is clear, concise, & well organized. Thoughts are expressed in a highly coherent & logical manner. Effort is exceptionally creative or well-fit to the topic. There are no spelling, grammar, or syntax errors or other construction mistakes. Bibliography is complete & correct.
tier 2 description: Presentation is mostly clear, concise, & well organized. Ideas & information are expressed in a basically coherent & logical manner. Effort is creative and matched to the topic. Bibliography is mostly complete & correct.
tier 3 description: Presentation is somewhat clear and organized. There are numerous spelling, grammar, or syntax errors. Presentation lacks creativity or effort. Bibliography is incomplete or has numerous errors
tier 4 description: Presentation is mostly unclear and/or disorganized. There are numerous spelling, grammar, or syntax errors. No creative effort. Bibliography is incomplete or unclear.
tier 5 description: Presentation is unclear and/or disorganized. There are numerous spelling, grammar, or syntax errors. No bibliography.
